Mapping Value: CASE WHEN SCAI30 = 'Y' THEN 'Closed' when scai17 = 'Y' then 'Stopped' when scai20 = 'Y' then 'Dormant' else 'Activated' END
CASE   WHEN S5AM1C >= 0 THEN ABS(TO_NUMBER(((S5PF.S5AM4C)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)) + ((S5PF.S5AM1C)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)))) ELSE ABS(TO_NUMBER((S5PF.S5AM4C)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED))) END
CASE WHEN S5AM1D <= 0 THEN ABS(TO_NUMBER(((S5AM4D)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)) + ((S5PF.S5AM1D)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED)))) ELSE ABS(TO_NUMBER((S5AM4D)/POWER(10,C8PF.C8CED))) END
INNER JOIN gfpf ON gfpf.gfcpnc = scpf.scan
INNER JOIN c8pf ON c8pf.c8ccy = scpf.scccy
LEFT JOIN s5pf ON s5pf.s5ab = scpf.scab AND s5pf.s5an = scpf.scan AND s5pf.s5as = scpf.scas
INNER JOIN c5pf ON c5pf.c5atp = scpf.scact
LEFT JOIN map_product ON scact = leg_acct_type
LEFT JOIN PROD_SUBPROD_PARAM ON DEST_PROD_CODE = PRODUCT_ACC_PRODUCTID and DEST_PROD_SUBCODE = PRODUCTCONTEXTCODE
